news.headline: Trump Says Drug Tariffs Probable by Aug. 1, Downplays More Deals
news.summary: (Bloomberg) -- President Donald Trump said he was likely to impose tariffs on pharmaceuticals as soon as the end of the month and that levies on semiconductors could come soon as well, suggesting that those import taxes could hit alongside broad “reciprocal” rates set for implementation on Aug. 1.Mo

news.headline: Nasdaq ends at another record high on Nvidia's China chip cheer
news.summary: STORY: U.S. stocks ended mixed on Tuesday, with the Dow dropping about one percent, the S&P 500 shedding four-tenths of a percent, but the Nasdaq ticked up nearly two-tenths of a percent.It was the fourth session out of five that the technology-heavy Nasdaq posted a record close.AI-chip leader Nvidi

news.headline: Apple's $500M MP Materials deal, Cook's leadership amid AI race
news.summary: Apple (AAPL) is in focus after announcing a $500 million deal to buy rare earth magnets from MP Materials (MP) as investors weigh CEO Tim Cook's role as the iPhone maker lags its Big Tech peers in the artificial intelligence (AI) race. news.headline: Podcast: Stock Indexes Close Mixed Amid New Trade Deal
news.summary: President Trump announced a new trade deal with Indonesia, while Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said the formal search for Fed Chair Jerome Powell’s successor has begun. Plus: Nvidia shares rose after the White House said the company will be able to sell artificial-intelligence chips to China.

news.headline: Apple lands record-breaking 81 Emmy Award nominations with "Severance" leading as this year’s most-nominated series and "The Studio" becoming the most-nominated freshman comedy in history
news.summary: CULVER CITY, Calif., July 15, 2025--Apple TV+ earns a record-breaking 81 Emmy Award nominations across 14 hit Apple Original titles for this year’s 77th Emmy Awards, as "Severance" becomes this year’s most-nominated series with 27 nominations, and "The Studio" makes history as the most-nominated fre
